snippet: One of Wisconsin’s best-known politicians, Tommy G. Thompson, finds himself in a four-way struggle for the Republican nomination in a changed political landscape.
abstract: Former Wisconsin Gov Tommy G Thompson, once seen as the dominant political voice in his state, is facing several challenges in seeking the Republican nomination for Senate; Thompson faces a changed political landscape and opponents that are trying to cast themselves as more conservative.
lead_paragraph: One of Wisconsin’s best-known politicians, Tommy G. Thompson, finds himself in a four-way struggle for the Republican nomination in a changed political landscape.

headline.seo: Tommy G. Thompson of Wisconsin Seeks Senate Seat
headline.main: Stiff Challenge for Thompson in Senate Race
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin’s 4-Way G.O.P. Primary Spotlights a Changed Political Scene
